io.github.reggert.reb4j

Interface Alternative

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Expression, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAlternative, AbstractQuantifiableSequenceableAlternative, AbstractSequenceableAlternative, Alternation, CharClass, CharLiteral, CharRange, Entity, Group, Group.Capture, Group.DisableFlags, Group.EnableFlags, Group.Independent, Group.NegativeLookAhead, Group.NegativeLookBehind, Group.NonCapturing, Group.PositiveLookAhead, Group.PositiveLookBehind, Intersection, Literal, MultiChar, NamedPredefinedClass, Negated, PredefinedClass, Quantified, Quantified.AnyTimes, Quantified.AtLeastOnce, Quantified.Optional, Quantified.RepeatExactly, Quantified.RepeatRange, Raw, Raw.Compound, Raw.EscapedLiteral, Sequence, SingleChar, StringLiteral, Union

    public interface Alternative
extends Expression
    Interface indicating that an expression can be used as an alternative in an alternation. This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Alternation or(Alternation right)
      Constructs an expression matching either the receiver or the any of the alternatives contained within the specified argument expression.
      Alternation or(Alternative right)
      Constructs an expression matching either the receiver or the specified argument expression.
